simplified: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生
traditional: 野火燒不盡，春風吹又生
pinyin: ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1

definitions.ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 ch: lit. even a prairie fire cannot destroy the grass - it grows again when the breeze blows (proverb); fig. cannot be easily eliminated; abbr. to 野火春風|野火春风[ye3 huo3 chun1 feng1];
